SEO_DESCRIPTION: Explore my portfolio to see my projects and skills. I'm a full-stack developer and I love to create websites and apps.

ABOUT_SECTION.TITLE: About me
ABOUT_SECTION.DESCRIPTION_1: My name is David Buenacasa, I am a programmer from Zaragoza, with experience in some programming languages.
ABOUT_SECTION.DESCRIPTION_2: I also have many hobbies related to the field of technology, such as home automation, virtual reality or 3d printing, I like to be always trying the latest technologies first hand when I have the chance.
ABOUT_SECTION.DESCRIPTION_3: Currently, I am reorienting myself towards Systems and Network administration.

TRABAJOS.descripcion: During my time at Deloitte, I worked as an ABAP programmer at SAP, focusing on Dynpros development, object oriented programming, ALV reporting and SD module focused tasks.
During my time at Audinfor System, I worked as a C# programmer, developing and maintaining robust and efficient applications for various company projects.
